enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Donald Mills, Special Adviser on International Environmental Matters, expressed serious concern at the reluctance of some to take necessary action.
KUWAIT: Dr. Abdulrahman Al-Muhailan, Minister of Health, said decisions should not rush forward but be on solid scientific foundations.
Kuwait has supported steady steps that may seem limited to some, and has supported the countries most subject to harm from economic and social consequences.
UZBEKISTAN: Victor E. Chub, Chief of Glavgidromet, reviewed problems associated with desertification in Uzbekistan.
